item.title: KVM & Virtual Machine Manager in Foresight
item.description: Foresight has long been a proponent of KVM over other virtualization technologies such as Xen or Virtualbox. If you, like me, aren’t a guru on the command line and prefer using a GUI, Virtual Machine Manager is available in the Foresight repositories. If you’ve used Virtualbox or VMWare, you’ll find virtual-manager very familiar. The only downside (for some), is that you will need a modern processor that supports Intel VT or AMD-V.
